text: Erithalis is a genus of flowering plants in the family Rubiaceae. The genus is found from southern Florida to tropical America. ==Species== * Erithalis angustifolia DC. * Erithalis diffusa Correll * Erithalis fruticosa L. * Erithalis harrisii Urb. * Erithalis odorifera Jacq. * Erithalis quadrangularis Krug & Urb. * Erithalis salmeoides Correll * Erithalis vacciniifolia (Griseb.) C.Wright ==References== ==External links== *Erithalis in the World Checklist of Rubiaceae Category:Rubiaceae genera Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Erithalis
